import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import { useState } from "react" import axios from "axios" import { toast } from "react-toastify" import { URL } from '../../../config' import './signup.css' import img2 from '../../../assets/add-user.png' const Signup = () => { const [firstName, setFirstName] = useState('') const [lastName, setLastName] = useState('') const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [phoneNo, setPhoneNo] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const [confirmPassword, setConfirmPassword] = useState('') const navigate = useNavigate() const signupUser = () => { if (firstName.length ==0){}} return <>
{ setFirstName(e.target.value) }} type="text" class="form-control" />
{ setLastName(e.target.value) }} type="text" class="form-control" />
{ setEmail(e.target.value) }} type="email" class="form-control" required />
{ setPassword(e.target.value) }} type="password" class="form-control" placeholder="Abcd@123" />

} export default Signup
